location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No 8 of 1823 from John Macleod, Resident in the Persian Gulf, Bushere [Bushire] to William Newnham, Chief Secretary to the Government, General Department, Bombay

mods.abstract: The letter is noting the death of Captain Frederick Faithfull, and reports that Captain Henry Hardy, as the next senior officer, has assumed charge of the Marine in the Persian Gulf for the time being.
